ability.name: O FLOWER AID, O EARTH DEFEND
ability.flavor: Revitalizing plants and jagged stones grow, helping allies and hindering foes.

effects.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the area gains the following effects: • Once at the start of your turn as a free maneuver, you and each ally in the area can spend any number of Recoveries. Once as a free maneuver at the start of your turn, you allow yourself and each ally in the area to spend any number of Recoveries. • The area is difficult terrain for enemies. • Each enemy who enters the area for the first time in a combat round or starts their turn there takes damage equal to your Reason score.
The area remains until the start of your next turn. As a maneuver, you can move the area up to 5 squares. This ability ends if the area is ever not within your line of effect.
